hints.content:
We can think of subtraction as:

$\goldE{\text{ part}} = \maroonD{\text{total}} - \blueE{\text{part}} $

We can also think of subtraction as:

$\blueE{\text{part}} = \maroonD{\text{total}} - \goldE{\text{ part}}$

So, we can subtract $\goldE{30}$ from $\maroonD{53}$ to find the missing $\blueE{\text{part}}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/e24fcd534b2473b0f15d2d5a699dd9ed32d7c838)

question.content:
**What number makes this equation true?**  
*Hint: Use the place value blocks to help solve.*

$30 = 53 - {}$ [[☃ numeric-input 1]]   

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/1ddfc81d026393e44a290a1013f8596777ce88e2)
